'''Lights Will Guide You Home (I)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 4 [[Seelie]] to their Seelie Courts on [[Narukami Island]], [[Kannazuka]], and [[Yashiori Island]] in Inazuma.

==Trivia==
*The name of the achievement is a reference to the song "{{w|Fix You}}" by {{w|Coldplay}}.
